titles.title: My Faith Has Found A Resting Place

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need no other argument, I need no other plea, It is enough that Jesus died, And that He died for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My heart is leaning on the Word, The living Word of God, Salvation by my Savior’s name, Salvation thro’ His blood.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
